entry.title: Let’s Rock!
entry.content:
During the corona days at home I got some extra time I spent for creating this site and learning new things.

TIL:

  • SwiftUI (some aspects)
  • Github Pages
  • Jekill for GitHub Pages

This day in history: Cosmonautics Day!
entry.summary: During the corona days at home I got some extra time I spent for creating this site and learning new things.

entry.title: Ready for work
entry.content:
The Lockdown contnues… RingFit Adventure helps to keep (my not ideal) shape )))

TIL:

  • SwiftUI Data Flow (some aspects)
  • Coding challenge from Ihnat completed!

This day in history: 1943 – World War II: The discovery of mass graves of Polish prisoners of war killed by Soviet forces in the Katyń Forest Massacre is announced, causing a diplomatic rift between the Polish government-in-exile in London and the Soviet Union, which denies responsibility.
